main.name: Anthony Christopher
main.DitemA: Determined and hardworking, I find pleasure in the proccess and being the best I can be.
main.bio: With a degree in Computer Science and Business from Whitworth University, I've cultivated a multifaceted skill set. Currently, I'm immersed in digital project management, software development, and sales, refining my expertise in these domains at my previous place of work at 14Four in Spokane. I also created LavTech my own web development venture. During our recent conversation,I have an aptitude for problem-solving and knack for innovative solutions, which I believe would be valuable contributions to any team. I'm genuinely excited about the opportunity to leverage these skills in a collaborative environment for mutual growth and success.

education.degree: Bachelors Degree in Computer Science and Business

work.title: Digital Project Manager
work.DitemA: - Managing digital projects with companies like Nike, Meta, Gatorade, Dick's,Monster Energy, and more scheduled meetings with clients, Created scopes of work for large clients, Sales, Developed AI-related projects to increase 14Four brand recognition
work.DitemC: - Developed AI-related projects to increase 14Four brand recognition
work.DitemD: - Ensured that projects met technical and aesthetic requirements
work.DitemE: - Developed a digital project plan that identiXed milestones, dependencies and resources needed to successfully complete the project

work.title: Fullstack Developer/Project Management Intern
work.DitemA: - Spearheaded the end-to-end development and deployment of diverse websites and web advertisements, showcasing adeptness in Nuxt, React, GSAP and JavaScript
work.DitemB: - Produced captivating and dynamic web banner ads, leveraging animation techniques to enhance engagement and user experience
work.DitemC: - Contributed substantially to the development of websites for prominent industry giants such as Nike, Gatorade, and Rock-star, showcasing expertise and adaptability in meeting corporate standards and requirements

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.DitemA: - Conducted comprehensive testing on the web application, meticulously identifying bugs and implementing improvements to elevate overall functionality and user experience
work.DitemB: - Played a pivotal role in liaising with clients to gather and comprehend project specifications, ensuring alignment between client expectations and development objectives
work.DitemC: - Executed comprehensive quality assurance measures, ensuring high standards of functionality, usability, and performance within the web application

work.title: Application/Web Developer
work.DitemA: - Led the end-to-end development of a comprehensive website for a local nonprofit organization, demonstrating expertise in React, JavaScript, SQL, and Django to deliver a robust digital platform
work.DitemB: - Produced compelling and visually engaging graphics, contributing to the brand identity and aesthetic appeal of the company's digital presence, and enhancing overall user experience and engagement

work.title: Grader
work.DitemA: -  Whitworth University Computer Science and Math department grader for CS1/CS2 class homework and exams.

work.title: Tech
work.DitemA: - Configuring and providing technical support for cellular devices, ensuring seamless integration into Target's inventory and sales systems.
work.DitemB: - At 5 am, overseeing the timely delivery and integration of tech inventory, providing specialized customer service, managing transactions for tech purchases, efficiently fulfilling online orders for tech products, and configuring cellular devices to ensure seamless integration into Target's systems.
work.DitemC: - Offering tech-focused support and guidance to customers, ensuring a positive in-store tech experience.

work.title: General Sales
work.DitemA: - Cultivated strong customer service abilities, ensuring exceptional experiences for patrons.
work.DitemB: - Maintained precise records of daily earnings using spreadsheets, contributing to financial tracking.
work.DitemC: - Enhanced sales proficiency by engaging customers effectively, contributing to sales growth.
